page.title: 06INDUSTRY AND MANUFACTURING
page.content: {DIRECT PRINTERS}Most of their work goes to schools and colleges but some goes to local people if asked. {RATIO PLASTICS}This firm makes model railway equipment. 25% of what they make goes abroad, mostly to Europe. The rest is sent all around Britain. {ACME WARDROBES}This company makes all sorts of furniture but mostly wardrobes. They send their furniture locally ,to Dorset and Wiltshire. {POWELL CRAFT}This firm sells wooden toys that they get imported from Czechoslovakia, Germany and the east of Poland. They sell a lot of toys to Ireland. {SALES, SERVICES, SUNDRIES}This company makes milking machines. They do not send any of their equipment abroad but they sell it all locally.
